title: (x) Jos Hachmang: Shop sans - CP Company {Marc O}
content:
Anyone can identify these fonts?

[http://home.planet.nl/~hachm000/shop/images/header\_GardenRocket.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070308155146/http:/home.planet.nl/~hachm000/shop/images/header_GardenRocket.gif)

Thanks in advance
author: egoexmachina

comments.content:
Hi there: This one I do not know. I’m not sure if its combination of two typefaces or just one.

Here is the originating website:  
 [http://home.planet.nl/~hachm000/shop/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20070308155146/http:/home.planet.nl/~hachm000/shop/index.htm)

Here are a few zoom-ins on the web graphics

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Orange_6666.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Green_5074.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Blue_3897.gif)

It’s not Preface though…

Thanks, Super Mike.

A couple of years ago I received a promotional postcard from a photographer that used CP Company. I didn’t know the face, so I wrote the photographer’s rep and found out what font they had chosen.

Obsessive? Me? ;)
thanx a lot, marcox and superultrafabulous, I really appreciate your help.
You are so very welcome! I learned something new today!
